name: Lemonado
description:
Lemonado is a project I started over four years ago and never finished.

Haven't touched it for three years. But now I wanna give it a try and bring my little lemon friend back!

All you need to do is making lemonade! You have to navigate the lemons through randomly selected levels right to the juicer machine.

It's a pretty early version, but I hope you enjoy :)

Controls are WASD or arrow keys.
